## Libraries
```{r}
library(party)
library(rpart)
library(treeheatr)
```

## Arrange the data
Manually create a class (as factor) column with the desired classification. Needs "resKR"
```{r}
data <- cbind(data.frame(class = as.factor(NA)), sub.coredata)

# check
all(c(getsamplesingrp(resKR, 1, 3),
  getsamplesingrp(resKR, 4, 18),
  getsamplesingrp(resKR, 5, 38),
  getsamplesingrp(resKR, 5, 39),
  getsamplesingrp(resKR, 3, 8),
  getsamplesingrp(resKR, 3, 11),
  getsamplesingrp(resKR, 3, 10))%in%sites.sel)

# reclassify
data$class[getsamplesingrp(resKR, 1, 3)] <- "KR1"


```

## Parameters
```{r}

predictors <- paste(colnames(data), collapse="+")
fmla <- as.formula(paste("class", predictors,sep="~"))


```
